review_body: Excellent program I greatly appreciate thes service. Very easy to search thru the app to select the items you want. Prices are shown, and are the same prices as in the store. You can select to allow substituitions if the item you want is not in stock. When you pick up your items you can elect to not accept the subsitute, and you are given credit right away. If you select no substitues then if they do not have the item, it shows that in your delivery notice on the app - and not charged, of course. After you have completed your list, you can keep adding items, as you think of them, up to midnight the day before. When you later go back into the app to add to add items, your list does not appear. You go ahead and select the item(s) you want, click to purchase and it will ask if you want to add it to your current order. Click ‚Äúyes‚Äù then you can review your full order. They send you an email when it is ready for pick up (at the previous time you have requsted). You can also look at the app and see the progress as your order is being prepared. Then go to the store to the Pick Up area, park in front of a number and tell them you are there on the app. Or wait and they‚Äôll come out and ask your name. It‚Äôs all simpler than this LONG explanation. Great Servce.

Gonna stick with Target As soon as I get my 2 items that I have coming that won‚Äôt come on time I will be deleting the app and never going to Walmart or using this service again.  So canceled the items I had in order and went to the target app and bought them there. Within 2 hours they get shipped and didn‚Äôt pay anything extra shipping.
Don‚Äôt fall for ‚Äú2 day shipping‚Äù or savings catcher Loved this app and Walmart. But a couple of the main things I liked have actually changed for the worse.

No Pay-and-Go I read an article that said that the Walmart Corporation planned to discontinue Pay-and-Go at Walmart but not at Sam‚Äôs Club. That was the first that I‚Äôd heard that Walmart has Pay-and-Go so I decided to try it. I was underwhelmed.

Savings Catcher- it works!!! I have been using savings catcher for a year now, been working to catch Walmart NOT giving me deals that I know other stores offer. Nope! Walmart ALWAYS give me those deals, they never ever miss!  One time I thought they did but I found out I was wrong. The other store had gone up on their price and it was I that was not aware... If you shop at Walmart you‚Äôd better download the Walmart app, use savings catcher, and stop playing around! I‚Äôve already saved $65 so far without even trying, just buying my same ordinary groceries that I normally buy, not doing ANYTHING different. I don‚Äôt have time for coupons and price checking and stuff.  Wayyy too busy for that!  So, after I check out I get into my car, open the app real quick, scan my receipt real quick, then go home. Two days later I check the app and see the savings building up. Just that easy! Once I get to $100 I‚Äôll redeem it for something. And it‚Äôs fun, the kids love watching it build up, too!.. You all better get this little extra money, we all deserve a break so why not? üòâ

BRING BACK RECEIPT UPLOAD IN SAVINGS CATCHER I have been using the Walmart app, primarily for the use of Savings Catcher, for many years now. While I didn‚Äôt always get back tons of money, I always appreciated knowing that I was getting the best deal without shopping around while also being able to save my receipts digitally. I am incredibly disappointed in the recent move to linking receipt uploads ONLY through Walmart pay. I have chosen not to use Walmart Pay for personal and security reasons, not to mention that I also like to pay cash. This move (clearly to force users to use Walmart pay or miss out) disenfranchises so many users! There are many people who don‚Äôt feel comfortable using that pay method, or that just need to manually upload for many reasons. I know that you have lost me for sure from your app, and possibly from shopping as often, as receipt uploads to savings catcher made me shop there more often. If I can‚Äôt use Savings Catcher without being forced to use Walmart Pay, then this is no different than any other store... no more incentive to shop here. I genuinely want to use Savings Catcher and have the convenience of having receipts saved for me again. Bring manual uploads back and I‚Äôll begin shopping here more frequently again.

App is not that great I only downloaded the app for the savings catcher. At one point, you were able to submit printed receipts via the app. Then, it was changed to where you have to use Walmart pay to get rebates on competitors prices. Some weeks, no prices were better. Other weeks I was getting several dollars back per receipt! Walmart released an email yesterday stating they would end this in May because their prices were often cheaper than their competitors. I feel that is a lie considering I usually get cash back from the app on 3/4 of the receipts submitted. I will use the app until May but after that I will delete it and shop with the competitors as opposed to doing all my shopping with Walmart. Most of the said competitors allow digital manufacturers coupons on their apps or loyalty cards. Walmart doesn‚Äôt have a loyalty card or an option for digital coupons on the app. It is virtually useless as I can do anything else from the app on their website. Once savings catcher is gone, it is a waste of space. I will be using the balance left over from the savings catcher and deleting this app. It literally will no longer provide me with any benefits that I cannot get from using the general website. Your competitors will be thanking me when they start receiving more of my business!

Suggestions... I love using this app. It‚Äôs been so convenient so many times BUT when I‚Äôm trying to find a certain item and I‚Äôm inside a Walmart store, I can‚Äôt search other Walmart stores. Even if I change the location of ‚ÄúMy Store‚Äù to the location I‚Äôm trying to search, and even turning off my location, it still keeps me at the current store I‚Äôm in. This makes it difficult to search other locations without having to first leave the local store I‚Äôm in. I‚Äôm trying to search a different store so I‚Äôll know beforehand if I need to buy a different product or order online. I‚Äôd like to search other locations while standing in one already! This has been an issue SO many times!

Reward dollars Walmart has initiated this app to keep their prices lower than their competitors which the whole point was for the customer to have an extra incentive to buy from Walmart and also for Walmart to always have lower prices than the competitors. But.....again Walmart has won and now you don‚Äôt rack up the reward dollars like you used to. I spent $600-$1000 per month and would get a substantial amount accumulated and I would save it up and I would purchase a big item. I have used it toward a $70 iron to a $250 pool. I enjoyed scanning my receipts....waiting to see how much I was going to get in return.....then deciding how long I wanted to accumulate them. Now.... Not so much now .....  I still spend the same amount and in the past eight months I have only accumulated $7.89 ü§ó.  Not much of an incentive to drive out of my way to a Walmart so I can save a dollar or two and then get to scan my receipt and then see that I didn‚Äôt even have any qualifying items.  I will just support my small businesses because at least I know that all the registers will be open.....the employees will be friendly.....and the owners will desperately appreciate my business.

The change to Savings Catcher has me shopping elsewhere I‚Äôm a disabled stay at home mom to 6 kids, the eldest is grown & lives with her fianc√©. My husband had to take over a year off work as I was too disabled to care for the kids, especially the 3 & 5 year olds. Our closest Wal-Mart is a 20 minute drive from our house. My husband & I would both make the drive specifically for Savings Catcher. With such a large family we obviously purchase a lot of food, toiletries, household items, clothes etc.

Walmart pay won‚Äôt work for security reasons??? !? I never write reviews but I came to look at the reviews to see if anyone else has the same problem turns out yes they do! I too have had Walmart savings catcher and the Walmart pay for forever now. I‚Äôve loaded hundred of dollars of gifts cards with no issue. Until the other day it‚Äôs declined for security reasons?? Use another payment. There‚Äôs plenty of money on there in e gift cards. Nobody in store or the 800 number knows anything multiple people in store and multiple transfers to departments at the 866 number and the end result was they will get back to me in 3-5 days by email with tech support! Reallly!!?? There‚Äôs no one to talk to? No one to rectify this now? Nobody to transfer to a tangible gift card so I can use it? I love my Walmart pay but now this has really put a wrench in my Walmart shopping. Come on Walmart there must be a better way ! why does nobody have an answer? Another solution they gave was to print the gift card and they can scan it. I sure hope that works although It really defeats the whole simplicity of Walmart payüòî I‚Äôm so disappointed!!!

Educate the Employees Between my husband and I we shop at Walmart 4-5 times a week for our growing family. We both use the app and savings catcher to help manage all of our receipts and to stay on budget for the month.

See the stars falling off soon Hate the new system. It‚Äôs not like Walmart‚Äôs have WiFi. And most Walmart‚Äôs have really bad signals! Can‚Äôt bring up savings catcher/Walmart pay if you can‚Äôt get a signal to do so.

App and store don‚Äôt work well together for returns. I made a purchase using Walmart pay and all seemed good though I wish it would print a physical receipt. The big issue was when I had to make a return. I started my return on the app as it supposed to make things easier. When I get to the counter the lady is asking me why I‚Äôm returning for each item even though I answered all that on the app. Not only that but I had so wait and watch her open each and every single item. Once she finished she said I was getting a gift card. I said excuse me no. I used my card with ur app to pay I‚Äôm not accepting a gift card. She gets her lead who is rude and says the same thing and all she does is show me the screen that says gift card. I told her again I‚Äôm not accepting a gift card and she said it‚Äôs not our app. That‚Äôs why we don‚Äôt accept returns with purchases made using Walmart pay. I told her, Walmart owns the app and you work for Walmart and represent Walmart therefore you are Walmart and this is your app. Long story short I had to get two other managers before someone could figure out what to do. Not sure how this app is suppose to make things easier or faster but I‚Äôll tell u that returns line only got longer while I waited to resolve my issue. Hate Walmart.

New changes results in tons of lost savings This USED to be a great app to get the most out of your money. Submitting a receipt was super easy, and the process took less than 2 minutes. Now, you have to use Walmart pay which I‚Äôm sure has caused a ton of people to stop using the app altogether. Along with that, if you receive SNAP benefits, you can‚Äôt add your EBT card as a method of payment. Clearly the people using snap benefits needs the rewards/savings just as most if not more to maximize purchases. I had a lot of fun using this app before they switched it but unfortunately I do not feel comfortable linking my debit cards to pay at checkout, and I have to primarily rely on SNAP benefits at the time being to provide food for my family. I really hope Walmart steps up because that is discrimination towards people in poverty and members of the lower working class. Shame on them. A simply solution would be any savings rewarded from a purchase using EBT can only be redeemed for food items. Surely with the money Walmart makes they can afford to upgrade the platform to allow such purchases via this app. I‚Äôll check back in a few months to see if they‚Äôve worked this muck out. Disappointed!

Savings catcher update.... I LOVED the old savings catcher program before October 28. I‚Äôm still one of those people who uses cash quite a bit, and to longer be able to put in my receipts for my cash purchases is so disappointing. I actually looked forward to putting in my receipts after each trip, and it was fun to watch my rewards add up over time. It gave me a incentive to shop there. I think in the past few weeks I‚Äôve been to Walmart at least 4 times a week, paid with cash, and have a stack of receipts I can‚Äôt even put in Savings Catcher. I know everyone will say to just deposit my cash and use my debit card, but I‚Äôve just always used cash, and our Walmart has some cash only registers that are quicker to get through. Also, with 5 daughters, it‚Äôs sometimes a hassle to deposit my cash, then go shopping, and to get my phone out and do the whole Walmart pay thing. On one of my visits, it froze up the whole self-check register and I had to re-ring my whole purchase at another register. Plus, using cash keeps me on a budget, and it‚Äôs just what I prefer. I wish you would consider bringing back the option to enter cash purchase receipts.

Just save the trouble and use Target Creating a baby registry on this app is a NIGHTMARE. I‚Äôll start by saying that it‚Äôs very frustrating that the registry is not a separate app from the rest of Walmart shopping (like Target does), because it makes navigating back and forth to your registry SUPER inconvenient. Anyways, when first creating your registry, your first and last name is required, which is understandable, however, it will not let you create a custom name for the registry itself. So, you can‚Äôt match the name to any other registries you‚Äôve created for your shower. Then, before you even get to look at any items for yourself, it adds a long list of things it ‚Äúthinks‚Äù you may want instead of just suggesting them to you(LIKE TARGET DOES). Oh, but it doesn‚Äôt even end there! If you don‚Äôt like the certain brands of wipes/diapers, or prints of clothing it has chosen for your child, you‚Äôll have to go through a 2-3 step process for EACH item to remove it from your registry. Not to mention, half the things it added to the list are out of stock! If I had not already put on my invitations that I am registered through Walmart and Target, I would delete this registry altogether. Complete headache.

Needs to show everything not half the items When you try to find things in the store or scan things that are in the store because you just bought it and you want to buy more but your home not at the store it acts like it can‚Äôt find it or it‚Äôs not there even though if you go down to the store you can find it but it will show you the item that cost more so if I wanted to preset a few things for walmart and pick it up I wouldn‚Äôt be able to because according to the app Walmart don‚Äôt carry it but I can go to walmart look right at it and what do you know it‚Äôs there plus I can scan it to price check it or order it then and with the same app it then shows that‚Äôs it‚Äôs at walmart.

Invasion of Pivacy! Walmart uses this app to SPY on you and here is how: every time you take your phone with this app downloaded in their store and you check out at all their self checkouts they have now and the cameras is A.I. Facial Recognition software and then send you SPAM Surveys for Walmart Gift-card ‚Äúdrawings‚Äù, you get your private information sold by the Waltons to 3rd party scam artist and they start calling you all day long (hundreds of calls in a month)! Total invasion of privacy and they illegally stop customers from Open Carry in Open Carry States, soon they will stop Conceal Carry and shopping will be like a Gangster‚Äôs Paradise for the Crinimals (100% unsafe to shop). I don‚Äôt like my face being recorded and my picture and personal information to include home address to be SOLD to more CROOKS aka SCAM ARTIST! It‚Äôs NOT RIGHT!

BRING BACK SAVINGS CATCHER!!! I‚Äôm EXTREMELY disappointed that you took Savings Catcher away!! It was a truly wonderful system that GUARANTEED I did absolutely ALL of my shopping at Walmart! After experiencing only a couple of minor user issues, I had no problems or complaints and managed to get back OVER $100 IN SAVINGS!! Because I usually had anywhere from $3-$10 in S.C. money available on my WalMart account, whenever there was an emergency of some sort that left our checking account empty, I was still able to make essential purchases (such as MILK, BREAD, TP, etc.) to get my family through till payday! More than ONCE we were able to manage thanks entirely to the S. C. program and I‚Äôve heard similar stories from friends who also utilized it. I was therefore SHOCKED and DISMAYED when I was told that the program had been terminated and no one could explain why. Not only THAT but WalMart doesn‚Äôt even do PRICE MATCHING anymore!
Gets worse with each passing moment This was an awesome app when I first downloaded a couple years ago but as time goes by and changes evolve it gets more discouraging with each use.

Order pick up at store So I went to Walmart to see about an LOL toy. I ordered it for store pick up and when I went to see about it because I wanted to be sure my email was right the manager said yes and they did have one left but had not found it yet and would email me. Later I got email saying my order was cancelled because it was now out of stock. I feel they should of asked if I wanted it cancelled or kept it on file like a first come when they did get a shipment. Not to mention my bank still shows this as a pending transaction and if I understand right I will have to check with my bank on this. Also for several times they say stores around me have limited or in stock on this item . I checked with at least three stores and they never even got any unless store employees got them first. I feel as though I should be given priority since I even had been given a confirmation number in the first place.

App very slow to log in I have always had issues with the time it takes to log in to savings catcher. The developer help is worthless. They just keep sending me emails saying  ‚Äúmy account is locked‚Äù. Even after deleting and reinstalling the app, it‚Äôs a little faster but not much. Tried an additional time to reinstall after talking with tech support on the phone, made sure my account was not blocked, now it says‚Äùoops, something went wrong, please try back later‚Äù. I deleted the app.

Great hidden features Sometimes you find you can benefit from an app, I recently switched to using just mobile data which means large apps and updates sometimes don‚Äôt happen, normally that would mean a visit to my local Apple store 50 mile round trip or Starbucks and buy a coffee just to go the updates.

Fantastic!! I use this app only to scan my receipts after checking out from Walmart.  Once I scan it takes a day or two to let me know if they located any stores with a less expensive price on the products I bought.  If so, the extra amount from what I spent at Walmart goes into my Walmart pay.  I can either use this at Walmart or redeem it for Cash.  I tend to collect quite a bit from this. I‚Äôve gotten back around $40 so far.  I would have let this slip through my fingers!!  Sure, a ton of stores price match BUT!!!!! When those stores price match they give you the discount then and there.  This app located the difference and gives you the money, which is welcome near the end of a pay week.  Not only that but the app has different features, along with ordering online, ordering by scanning things on the barcode scanner (participating locations) and other stuff.  I love this app!
Great app- I still don‚Äôt understand why Savings Catcher doesn‚Äôt price match with Walgreens! The store employees seem to think it does automatically pricematch with Walgreen but advertised prices

WALMART GRAPEVINE IS HORRIBLE!!! One would think that with all the money that Walmart Grapevine rakes in every minute of every day, they could afford to turn on the air conditioning & keep its customers comfortable during their shopping experience....but NO & NOT A CHANCE!  Every summer this store is hotter than hell, to the point of being unbearable, and when you address the matter with Store Management as we have many a time, we are always told that they have broken units & they are being fixed. Nope, not buying that lousy excuse again.  Walmart Grapevine has figured out that most customers will shop there anyway because of pricing & they can save tons of money by operating this store with fewer air conditioning units turned on!

Great except for one tiny thing Purchase history no longer has the option to save a receipt directly to iPhone camera roll. This was a very convenient feature that had been present for some time, and I would just like to see the option be reinstated.

Going to shop elsewhere! This used to be my favorite app and store to shop at. I even drive pretty far from my home to do my shopping. However, you have ruined this app. I have 4 receipts that I can‚Äôt upload because you have to use Walmart pay to load your receiptsat the time of purchase. So this takes the way I choose to save and pay out of my hands and gives it to you. Also, often times my husband will stop at night on his way home from work to pick up a few things and I can‚Äôt add those either. This app was pretty much the reason I‚Äôd go out of my way to shop at Walmart. I drive by a target, bakers, aldi, Whole Foods, and hyvee to shop at Walmart. I would also wait until my savings added up to a certain amount and then use it, if you‚Äôre forcing me to pay with the app, than it will use up my gift card each time. Making it feel like I‚Äôm not saving at all. Last thing, I have 7 kids, one is 3 months old, I don‚Äôt want to fuss with a phone while I‚Äôm trying to pay. Not everyone has their phone out all the time. This is very disappointing, I guess I‚Äôll be doing the research for a lower price and shopping elsewhere now.

Confused at the complains..... I‚Äôve been using Walmart‚Äôs savings catcher for a while now. That‚Äôs the whole reason I got the app in the first place. Well that and it‚Äôs nice to be able to see if my store has something I want and If they do it will direct me to the exact isle it is in which is nice.

App Getting Worse I used to love this app. I mostly used it for the savings catcher, but occasionally would search for items to order online or for birthday party decoration planning. Now I usually can't search for items without an error which causes me to just go to the website. And for the past few updates, I've noticed that the app is not connecting to the internet. It doesn't matter if I'm on my wifi or using my phone's provider network, it doesn't work. The only way I can use the app is if I am at a Walmart, on their wifi. So if I forget to add my receipt to the savings catcher as soon as I check out, then I will not be able to add it. Usually by the time I'm back at the store is one week later and because you can't add the receipt 7 days later, you lose out. Anyone else having this problem? Last week, I forgot to charge my phone before I left the house and my phone died while I was adding my receipt, so I'm sure it didn't go through. I'm getting extremely frustrated!

Worthless Not sure how this is an award winning app - so far I have found it pretty useless!  ‚ÄúItems in stock‚Äù is not accurate,  I had a manager tell me the computers don't update frequently enough for the app to be current - so what‚Äôs the point? ( they had none of the item I was looking for but the app said it was available)

Store need more cashiers I went to the store to buy 7-8 items and ended up buying 38 items at 8:30 am.  There was only one cashier on duty and the line was backed up.  I elected to go to the self scan kiosk , even though my car has was parked at the other end of the store.  There was no line and more than one open machine at self scan.  The young man on duty decided to burst my chops about using self scan, even though it was not busy.  When I asked where was the sign it was placed not outside but inside the area.  Also he watched me come into the area and waited until I was almost through check out before informing me I should have gone through the regular line.  If he had objections then he should have stopped me in the beginning before making my 38  items an issue.  If this is an issue Walmart should have had more than one open line so at 8:30 in the morning we are not waiting to check out.  I purposely went early to avoid Saturday lines.  The security lady was very nice when I complained to her, but it still makes me very angry!!!!

Busy? How Latest update says Siri can now tell me if Walmart is busy. How does this work? I tried and she gave me a list of the stores nothing new there. Is this only for a few areas(need to specify if it is in patch notes)? It is a great idea but... promises, promises. That knocks one star right off the bat.

Walmart Pay I really liked Savings Catcher, it was great especially after price matching at the register was discontinued. The daily updates to the app notwithstanding; I can't seem to get Wal Pay to work. I already use my iPod to manage my shopping list, so that's how I access the app (just using Notes for my list). Last couple of tries at using Pay, my iPod crashed, the app drained my battery, I got a Low Battery warning, and it shut down completely. So, I tried not even looking at my list in Notes, logging into the app at checkout. Placed the iPod over the terminal and tried to get it to scan (just for good measure I was on your WiFi), and it didn't drain battery immediately but due to overhead glare I think it would not read.... and then battery drained. Tried this at home an it is the QR scan that is draining the battery. Never happened before the Catcher was deactivated, a few months ago I could use the QR on the receipt to process Savings Catcher. I hope this improves because Walmart is where I used to do all my shopping.

It‚Äôs just not worth it.. After realizing that I just gave Walmart access to my photos to use a savings functionality that is not useable unless I give them access to my credit card info as well (Walmart pay) not to mention the app is asking for my location data at all times...I realized that throwing out my privacy to save a few bucks (if I‚Äôm lucky!) is not worth it to me. I‚Äôm deleting it now but I wanted to leave a review first since the glowing positive reviews nudged me into the ‚Äúapp downloader‚Äù category in the first place. Think about why you want to save a few bucks. If your answer is anything similar to ‚Äúso I can lead a fulfilled life with the satisfaction that comes from buying a cartfull of

Something is missing I like being able to shop online, scan my receipts from the store, and the speedy mobile returns seem like they would be extremely convenient as well.  I try to avoid returning items because of how much hassle involved, but when I saw that I could fast track the process, I was excited because I had bought a couple of items that I ended up needing to return.  The first part of the process on the app was very easy.  Took the items to the store, only to find out that customer service was already closed for the day.  Left with the items, then over the course of the next week we found a use for the two items so now we are keeping them. Well, almost two months later, they‚Äôre still on my list as scheduled to be returned.  There should be a way to cancel these, but I have no idea how.  Tried Googling ‚Äúhow to cancel returns in Walmart app‚Äù, but not having any luck.

Cludgy App The issue I have with this app is the way it handles pharmacy business. Making that a stepchild of the same app that sells lawn furniture and toilet paper did not work well. If you are used to ‚Äúreal‚Äù pharmacy apps, like Walgreens and CVS apps, you will be pulling your hair out. First, it took weeks for prescriptions that I had filled at Walmart - even those filled USING THIS APP to show up on the on-line account. I don‚Äôt know still if my history is showing in this app because it still won‚Äôt let me access Rx status or history because it doesn‚Äôt believe the birthday I am putting in apparently, even though I have confirmed with their pharmacy that they have my correct birthday in their system. In the app, I put my birthday in  whenever I have tried use it to check Rx history or status it says ‚ÄúSorry, we are having trouble with your request. Please try again later.‚Äù  I have tried many ‚Äúlaters‚Äù to no avail. So, as a result, I have only been able to use the app to transfer prescriptions or refill them using the Rx number. Nothing else works so far.

So many things wrong Where to start!? As I‚Äôm not sure I have the time to right it all out, I guess I‚Äôll just talk about my two biggest things that are at the top of my list right now. I wish I could post screen shots to show exactly what I‚Äôm referring to but sadly I cannot. Also keep in mind that for these examples I have already selected search for item at my store. First, why the different price listings? On the search page it will regularly list an item at one price, for example of something I just looked up was a usb cable, on the search page listed at $2.50 yet when you click on it, now it‚Äôs $7.88!?

Customer service I went to shop and the store was very clean and organized... a lady manager held my groceries for me because I had to run out and get my 8 year old to use the restroom.. after that another cashier went and got my stuff and took me to a register and said she would check me out... I offered to wait in line but she said it‚Äôs ok, come over here... they both said have a nice day... that would be a boring review... However, I am a white guy visiting Chicago and the entire store, staff and customers were African- American... I was not treated like a white man, just a customer, so I was treated so kind I would always beg to differ with any unkind comments about the people of Chicago coming from anybody else, ever.... I hope this is read by corporate and the staff of that entire store gets some kind of recognition and gift... Thank you so much people of Chicago Walmart on Cottage grove avenue üòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòç

Savings catcher account It is a good thing but before they changed things they had moved 70 plus dollar to a ecard that I never could figure out how to use and then when they changed things I never got it back in my account nor do I know what happened to it my account has been messed up then I bought some stuff online for Christmas but they had me go to the third party they had on the site and I never got what I ordered which was some jeans and I called the other place which was some Chinese people and they took my information and I have called and called but they always say a ticket put in and will call back here it is June that was December I guess I am just out of my money without anything I bought smh. Walmart I had many problems ordering ex specially during Christmas I ordered a PlayStation and then right before they shipped it is said no longer in stock when they first said in stock . I am having a hard time wanting to shop cause when I do things get screwed up or like then my money was taken off my savings catcher account and it was less .

Very unhappy shopper. You have taken out half of the checkout lanes and replaced them with self checkout lanes. I do not have a debit card for my checking account. That means I can not write a check for my groceries at the self checkouts. So I have to stand in line 15 or 20 minutes for a checkout line with a checker. I shop exclusively at Walmart because there is only two other places in London, KY.  And they are much more expensive. For me this is much much more inconvenient. Then her comes the best part. I register my receipt on the Walmart app. Then they check around for a lower price and if they find one I get the difference. It pays (literally) to shop Walmart. Hope to see you there. Walmart I am currently available for TV commercials Just holler at your girl.

For a manager please I only gave a 3 because there‚Äôs to many people who  are NOT HANDICAPED but they are using the parking spaces , plus people are leaving their children use the scooters inside & out (their NOT HANDICAPED ) 1 lady came in 1 afternoon with 6 kids the older 4 each had a scooter & they were racing through the store causing problems 2 of them hit into me with the scooters & im HANDICAPED I walk bent over I can‚Äôt stand straight up and down I haven‚Äôt been able to for Lil over 10 yrs I‚Äôm just asking for someone to try and do something with this and the other thing is on this app I use to be able to put receipts in and I‚Äôd get afew bucks back around about every other time now I‚Äôm lucky if I get anything back at all so could someone look into that please thank you have s great day & God Bless

Not dependable on getting grocery items I used to love Walmart, but since the last year or two have been unable to get simple items like Florida‚Äôs Natural no pulp orange juice, Hood chocolate non fat frozen yogurt, Folgers decaffeinated coffee, Pepperidge farm 45 cal oatmeal bread, garlic salt, Pepperidge farm marble rye bread, etc.  I can never rely on Walmart to have the items to make my meals.

Disappointed Since Walmart ‚Äúupgraded‚Äù their app I have had difficulty scanning my receipts. I know someone in corporate will try to place blame on my Phone or some operator error, but my problems did not start until the upgrade. First whenever I scan a receipt, 90% of the time I get an error message that there are difficulties and I have to manually put in the the TC# That‚Äôs fine, but the whole reason for an app in convenience. Second, I am getting email messages that say my receipt is invalid this happens constantly. I will check the TC # provided in my message against the TC# on my receipt and the # is the same. There is some avenue to take to dispute this but again where is convenience in that. Before I scanned my receipt and that was it. Now I have to put in the 21 digit # wait for the message that says it is invalid and dispute that claim.  I believe that I will just start shopping at Kroger.

Good not great As I have read on several other reviews, yes, Walmart takes too long to process receipts and misses many sale prices. If they would still do price match for people prepared to bring in other adds I wouldn‚Äôt complain but they won‚Äôt. And, my app only works for a couple of days at a time. I contacted customer service the first few times it stopped working and each time the first questioned they asked was if I had tried to uninstalled and reinstalled the app. So apparently they know there is an issue and that is the answer because it does work, but only for a few days and I have to do it again...not ideal. Basically it is a decent app but you need patience and if you want to guarantee you get a sale price on something, go where the sale is :/

Where Do I Submit Receipts? When we first began using Walmart Pay, I would open Savings Catcher after my husband returned home with the groceries, and the receipts were shown there with the option to submit them for savings review. Now I can‚Äôt find that anymore. My receipts are all listed, but there‚Äôs no ‚Äúsubmit‚Äù option. I‚Äôm very confused. I know it was there at the end of October, the last time I remembered to submit a receipt.

Was great but now... They are getting rid of savings catcher? That was the best thing about the app.  As it is, I have to travel past the 2 Walmart‚Äôs closest to me to shop because the prices in the stores near me are ridiculously high.  For example, a gallon of milk was priced at $3.33 and $3.39 at each of the 2 closest Walmart‚Äôs. The price at the 3rd closest was $1.89 on the same day. The stores are less than 10 miles apart.  I can understand some minor price differences but this is totally unacceptable.

Frustrating App The app‚Äôs simple design would be great if it worked right. When you scroll, it‚Äôs supposed to load more results but instead just loads the same items you already saw. And if you click on an item and go back it takes you back up to the top of the results. Frustrating when you scrolled quite a ways down. Also, the inventory is never up to date. I‚Äôll click on a size and then it‚Äôll say out of stock. Click on the other sizes just to see and every size is out of stock. So why even have it on the site? Also, returning an online order isn‚Äôt always easy. Because the barcode from online items doesn‚Äôt always scan right in store. Even with the receipt I have a hard time getting the cashier to do the return because the item doesn‚Äôt scan right even though it clearly matches the description and item on the app.

Warning: There are irritating bugs/glitches The selections and offerings are great but the app can be extremely irritating to use.  There is an issue with the app crashing while in use on a fairly regular basis.  In addition, when you‚Äòre searching the site, the app constantly resets to the beginning of your search query.  This glitch annoyingly takes you back to the start of any product search results and then you have to re-scroll through everything to get back to where you originally left off.  If this happened once in a while, that‚Äôd be one thing but the fact that it happens over and over again, is exhaustingly infuriating.  Honestly, this issue has literally caused me to just close the app and take my shopping elsewhere. Walmart...please fix this so I can search and shop in peace.

Ordering on-line What a disaster! My whole purpose for ordering on-line was to avoid being around people. I have been in the WalMart store more times, trying to get my order WHICH an email said was ready for pickup, and still only have pieces of my order. Every day I get the same email saying to pick up by April 1, but when I went to the ‚Äúorange kiosk‚Äù ( sent there each time by ‚Äúgrocery‚Äù pick-up) they say I already picked it up!! I‚Äôll try HyVee next time. I‚Äôve wasted a lot of gas, a lot of my time. I will be 80 years old this Summer and have Asthma & nodules in my lungs. I tried to self quarantined but that did no good. I‚Äôm in WalMart more than ever on ordering on-line.

Assistant is annoying! It is very annoying to have to wait for the assistant to load when you open the app. I use Walmart Pay all the time. Having the assistant load before you can do anything REALLY slows down the checkout process. It‚Äôs so slow that it would be faster to pull my wallet out and just use my card. I was hoping that they would have fixed this issue in this last update, but it‚Äôs still there. I can‚Äôt understand why anyone would think it was a good idea to have that interface load up to let you know there‚Äôs an assistant before you can do anything. A mobile pay process is all about convenience and speed yet you have to wait for a graphic to load and tell you your assistant is ready before you can do anything. So dumb! Hopefully they can find a better way soon.

Tina Ok, I was annoyed because every time I grab something on sale it rings up the regular price as it did today. Well I have gotten smart enough to take a picture of what I get that is on sale. So I am checking out, of course an item, quantity of 4 came regular price. I asked for help, Tina came over and with a smile and patience she removed all 4 items. She got confirmation of the sale price and entered the correct price for me. BUT while doing this she made sure she thanked other customers without missing a lick. WOW, I will be coming to Walmart instead of Kroger just to see Tina for a few seconds. She makes you feel like you are coming into her home!!!

Bare shelves I shop at Walmart at least 3 times a week however lately (4+ months) they have been almost completely out of my waters in the 5 stores around me. Both Summerville locations, both GooseCreek locations and the one in North Charleston, South Carolina.  I‚Äôm tired of driving around town going to different stores looking for BlackBerry Clear American Ice waters. If Walmart is going out of business I understand but I think it‚Äôs just Bad store managers who don‚Äôt stock shelves properly. I would order multiple cases if they would allow it, but every store refuses. WHY? A family of 4 who drinks only plain water and the BlackBerry Clear I need TONS of it. Walmart either tell me you are discontinuing this item, allow me to order cases or stock your shelves!

Store Hours I liked the app quite a bit was easy to order things and all that but on Christmas Eve I showed up to get the things I ordered through the pickup part of the store and when I arrived to get them at 630pm i found out they were closed for the night and that they left at 3pm that day and the store itself closed at 630pm. The only way to have known that would have been to show up physically to Walmart where the hours were posted. The Application said the pickup was open that day from 8am-8pm and the store itself was open 24hrs. Nothing about My store advertised hours. I had to go buy all of my things at another retail brand that was thankfully open so I could have presents for my kids in Christmas Day. Other than that the app is okay.

Worthless App Now Unless you want to add your credit card or debit card to your account, the app is now useless. Does Walmart not realize that people are afraid of having their identity stolen, and don‚Äôt want to put their credit/debit information on every site/app, and have the chance it will be stolen? Also, not being able to scan your receipts would be fine.. but having to scan the machine inside Walmart is stupid, for the plain and simple fact that 9 times out of 10.. their WiFi doesn‚Äôt work right and doesn‚Äôt even bring the app up! I have brought this to their attention many many times.. I even offered them a solution of, why not let us type in our phone numbers... but, nooo. They just don‚Äôt want you to save money and want you to think you are... they want you to risk your debit/credit information being stolen as well!

What happened to Savings Catcher What happened to the Savings Catcher portion of the app?? All I see is the Walmart Pay which I can‚Äôt submit my receipt into that. This is an inconvenience. I don‚Äôt always use a card to pay for my things. We should still have that option to save the money while using cash. Please change this back, I can go to Kroger because it‚Äôs closest but I choose Walmart to actually see the savings. If I can‚Äôt see the savings then what‚Äôs the point of going out of my way? If it‚Äôs not broken, don‚Äôt fix it üôÑ

Sort & filter doesn‚Äôt work The sort & filter option on the app does nothing when I click apply. It goes back to showing everything. I don‚Äôt want to scroll through 116 items to find the brand that I want to order. If you have the sort & filter option, then make sure it works. What‚Äôs the point of using it if it just shows you all the brands because Walmart wants to try to sell you a different brand than what you at looking for. You should also have a complaint line or somewhere you can easily reach someone to make a complaint. I can‚Äôt find that option on the app or on the website. It only gives you an option for feedback when Walmart decides to send you an email after you order something.

New App is P.O.S. Savings catcher used to be the best thing. Now IF you can even get the app to work in store it‚Äôs usually a miracle. I can probably get Walmart Pay to work 1 out of 10 times...if I‚Äôm lucky. So disappointed. Walmart, you know the old saying ‚Äúif it ain‚Äôt broke don‚Äôt fix it‚Äù? Well whoever has these ideas for updates should think about the overall user experience.

Walmart Pay??? Saving catcher worked great. Then Walmart decided it was too easy. So they decided in order to use the savings catcher you have to use Walmart Pay. So reluctantly I started using Walmart pay. Ok it worked fine but I never got the savings that I did with Walmart pay. So then I guess that was too easy and they want to force us all into using their Walmart pickup. So now I go shopping and check myself out because they don‚Äôt want to employ People, the store is mostly self checkout. And the new update has taken away Walmart pay. In Order to use it you must order online. And while I do use Walmart pickup, I don‚Äôt like being forced to. I like to look around and pick things out. So originally I gave Walmart app a five star review when it was saving catcher but now 2 stars. Stop trying to make things better, your failing

Horrible Customer Service After I made a transaction it said that my debit card was declined, let me reassure you that I had PLENTY money in there and like 14 dollars taken from it wouldn‚Äôt mess it up. And so it declined it and I used my credit card and it approved my credit card. It went and it took money both out of my debit card and my credit card. I totally get computer glitches and everything so I was calm. But when I went back in I had to wait 15 minutes just to have a 2 minute conversation. Let me also say there was many managers standing around talking about non work related things. Finally a worker came from the check out aisle that was working and came over. The other two managers that were just standing there walked away talking.

I love this app We do 95% of our shopping at Walmart.  We love the convenience of the Super Centers, as well as the fresh produce at the Market.  I collect my money throughout the year and use them on whatever I like.  Kids shopping, me shopping, getting money off of groceries I buy.  To date I earn about $200 a year.  Thats right people $200 a year!  I also use Ebates and earn a ton as well.  These apps are wonderful.  I just scan/click and go!  I don't know what others complain about.  It is the first app in a long time that just WORKS.  It is getting slow, but I have addressed that with the program team.  Keep up the great work Walmart!!

Outstanding App I love being able to order as I go for my shopping. I can create an order and get back to it later. I can remove and add items as I go. Sometimes I go as long as a month and my order is still there for updating. Once I‚Äôm ready to order, I simply update and submit it. Choose the date and time that I want to pick it up, And that is it. One thing I will suggest, is always print out your order before you go pick it up. Make sure the attendant goes over everything with you and check your order when you get home on your email as well. Less problems that way.

Good app needs a few tweaks I like the app however I  would like the app or the online shopping area to stay up to date on the products as they are always out of stock and not just for a short period of time. Sometimes for months!! It's ridiculous for a consumer and some of the products say they're available for 2day shipping but then during check out it gives you an error message saying OPPS not available on your area please go back and pick a different store.. Well it was and is available in my store!! Ugggg

Comment on your new app and on My store. I really appreciated and enjoyed having the Location of items noted in your app Care should be taken to make sure that Each aisle is marked and the location is correct. I am having a difficulty with my store being out of stock on items that are listed within the application as in stock and ready to pick up. This is happened to me almost every time I have shopped for my groceries With at least two items not being able to purchase the size that I wanted.  Since I live quite a distance from my Walmart store I do check to see if you have the essential items that I want to purchase before I come. I need this to change in order for me to travel this distance to shop here.

Frustrated with scanning receipts I feel like I‚Äôm getting ripped off when I use self checkout the QR and barcode won‚Äôt scan to save my receipts for price matching. Then, it won‚Äôt accept the barcode number either!! This has been an issue for months and I‚Äôve posted this before and it hasn‚Äôt been fixed. Please fix the issue so I can use my receipts. No one at the store is ever any help or willing to reprint a receipt either ... assuming they even are aware of the Walmart app. This is so frustrating that it hasn‚Äôt been addressed and I just keep losing money because of it. Makes it seem like it‚Äôs being ignored purposely. I‚Äôll actually be shocked if this is even addressed or I get a response. I would give it a five star if it gets corrected and acknowledged.

Need to have patient associate I always shop at Walmart, an always tell friends to shop their but lately the way associate are when you ask them a question or get info about a product , it‚Äôs like we are a burden they wanna be talking among each other An stalking merchandise , well whAt about the customer where did customer service go when it comes to getting information about a product or ordering merchandise , an especially if it‚Äôs not in their area every associate needs to learn every dept about what‚Äôs in the area so they know An can give out info it seems like I‚Äôm waisting their time of them going out of your way.. uhhh

author_name: How can you get five stars
review_body: More difficult to get to pharmacy This app I give one star, for one reason or use it to refill my pills from the scanner. For one you open the app it is much cluttered, you have to look to find the pharmacy part then inside the part after you scan your bottle, then you have to put in your birthdate, they changed it to a scroll system it takes longer and makes it more difficult when you just want to get it done, it used to be just type your date in, Don't know why they keep changing something that worked right in the first place. Our use RiteAid Pharmacy as well, their app is so simple, you open the app pharmacy right there you scan your pills you're done text me 30Seconds or less for Rite Aid RiteAid, Walmart takes me four minutes just for the whole process of one bottle alone. Maybe they should just make an app for pharmacy and that's all

Invaluable OK, so I‚Äôm going to Walmart and I can usually find what I‚Äôm looking for with a little bit of searching. Then one morning I was in a Walmart and the associate pulled up her phone after I asked her where something was. She said it‚Äôs on aisle xx. I asked her if she had a special employee app and she said no it was the Walmart app.
Staff doesn‚Äôt know or tech doesn‚Äôt work I downloaded the app for the savings catcher and to use the mobile express return lane, both are pointless.

Online order hell Ordered something online. Told it was back ordered. Then suddenly without notice, I get a email the day I‚Äôm leaving to go out of town saying it arrived at the destination store. The email stated it had to be picked up in 7 days. I return in 8 days. I called the store (which was like trying to call AOL - virtually impossible). I called the Walmart customer service and they said they would return the order. I said I‚Äôll be there one day after the end of the 7 days. They said they have ‚ÄòNo way to communicate with the store. It is story policy to hold online orders for 7 days only and then return it.‚Äù I tried to call the store and the phone rang for over 5 minutes.
Disappointed in our Noblesville store: The Noblesville store is our primary store to shop at.  However,  we are becoming more and more dissatisfied.  The store seems always low on merchandise

Bring Back Savings Catcher I like using the app to search and find things while in the store. However, I‚Äôm disappointed in the new update that removes the ability to submit receipts to the Savings Catcher if not using Walmart Pay. I also dislike the inability to accumulate your credits from the Savings Catcher if you‚Äôre using Walmart Pay. There is no option to defer using your Savings Catcher credits for a later purchase. The system wipes whatever you‚Äôve accumulated first, and then you pay the remainder with cash or debit/credit card. I liked accumulating my Savings Catcher credits and using them for a large purchase. I can no longer do that. I would still use the credits towards a Walmart purchase, so why not let me accumulate them?

BRING BACK RECEIPT UPLOAD I don‚Äôt have very many grocery store options where I‚Äôm located, so I try to save money where I can. So with that I prefer getting my groceries at Walmart knowing I can upload my receipts later on and get money back from it. This feature has since been removed and I am forced to either use Walmart pay or miss out on the savings since I can no longer scan my receipts. Due to this I have stopped shopping at Walmart since there is no longer a reason to go there. I do not want to set up Walmart pay, so I am choosing not to use the app anymore and taking my business elsewhere. This was an incredible idea to help save customers money, even if it‚Äôs only a dollar here and there it adds up over time. BRING BACK RECIPT UPLOAD and I will return my business and support.. until then, adios üëãüèΩ

Not allowing scanned receipts is bogus! I've had Savings Catcher for a year or so, and it was a great way to save money, not to mention time. I would often have my son pick up my grocery items from Walmart as we live 20 minutes away, but he works nearby. Savings Catcher would let me scan the receipts and save on the groceries that he bought for me. Now we're no longer allowed to add scanned receipts, there's much less incentive to shop for my groceries at Walmart. I'll have him go to one of the grocery stores, which are closer to his workplace, anyway.

GREEDY WALMART We used to be able to take pictures of our receipts and get money back if lower prices were found elsewhere. They took that option away so now if I want to get money back I HAVE TO pay with the Walmart app. If my phone is dead at the moment or I am paying with cash then it‚Äôs not possible to do savings catcher. I have multiple apps where I scan receipts and get money back but with this Walmart one it keeps my receipt disabling me from being able to take pictures of it for other apps and I like to have digital copies of my receipts but I can not with this app now, it cuts all the items off. I have also just discovered that using Walmart pay does not even automatically upload the receipt to savings catcher!!!! You have to do it yourself!! I have missed out for months and my balance is zero but should be higher!!!!!!!! I AM DONE USING THIS APP.

Savings catcher The savings catcher series has definitely gotten to be a worse feature!  It is price comparison & I wI loved  this feature & used it all the time & used to be able to just scan the receipt but ever since they changed to having to do it through the Walmart pay, I have lost this whole feature with the chance to even scan sooo many times, because the cashiers never know what it is let alone how to do it! In the meantime there may be customers in line behind you getting angry if you try to use this & taking up all their time BECAUSE the cashiers know nothing about it/ or even let you do this!  I‚Äôve had cashiers stop & call someone over who did not know either & managers who also did not know & finally numerous times I‚Äôve just ended up saying just forget it & never collecting it. PLEASE return it to the way it was!

In Store or nah? Can‚Äôt tell! I love scanning prices, being able to order online, and making my credit card payment thru the app. The Money Services options are very convenient for me too! What I DONT like is... when I look up an item and change the search option from Online to In-store, it still shows me the online only options. Why even have an ‚Äúin store,‚Äù option?! Also, changing the store is frustrating. There are multiple Walmarts in my area so sometimes if I can‚Äôt find an item at one Walmart I like to check others, but changing the home store doesn‚Äôt always ‚Äútake.‚Äù Maybe if there was a ‚Äúcheck other stores‚Äù option that didn‚Äôt force me to change my home store, I would be more satisfied.
Recent update problems I use the app several times a day. I‚Äôve even used it at comparable stores. If I look something up or scan something, it lets me know if it‚Äôs lower priced at my Walmart.

Everything is out of stock and this makes shopping maddening! I understand supplies are low on cleaners and other popular supplies but !!!please!!! Provide a way to filter by in stock items only (online or in store pick up). It is absolutely maddening trying to find out what I can actually purchase today either in-store or online. If I search for Lysol, disinfectant or antibacterial and you don‚Äôt have any of these items in stock- please just say so and stop showing a ton of things you carry but are currently unavailable. Listing items out of stock makes me think I can actually purchase and then I click through only to be disappointed. This wastes my time, then I waste more time coming here and complaining about it üò´

Overall good, but navigating app is cumbersome A couple things about this app are super annoying and I keep thinking they‚Äôll fix it eventually. First off, getting to the Walmart Pay screen to pay takes far too many screen selections.  After self checkout, it looks like you‚Äôre playing with your phone but you‚Äôre clicking through a maze of selections to get to Walmart Pay. Make a single, stand-alone icon for Walmart Pay rather than having to navigate through the app to get to arguably the most utilized part of the app. Second, finding the order status is so clumsy.  Account>purchase history>scroll around until you find it. Make this easier, instead of mixing online orders with in-store purchases.

Nothing but hate now! Update Mar 2. Just ran new update and app still won‚Äôt load, hasn‚Äôt in months. No point in writing bad reviews they Don‚Äôt care. I‚Äôm just going to delete this app, cause they don‚Äôt seem to care if you can actually use it or not!!!

App is great however Walmart Pay is lacking The app itself is fantastic! I can easily find the items I want to order and it helps to find the isles for the merchandise I need. The trouble is I‚Äôve been using Apple Pay frequently and it‚Äôs quick convenient and easy. Walmart pay is almost just as slow and  as pulling out the old plastic. It‚Äôs in no way revolutionary nor a technological achievement. With quick on the go lifestyles time is important to your customers. Get with Apple incorporate savings catcher as a rewards program instead of a stand alone and increase the speed of your check out lanes.

Walmart App ok...Walmart Grocery has a lot to improve upon Once an order is submitted, you have the option to add items to that standing order; however, you can‚Äôt be promised you‚Äôll get those items-because Walmart Pickers make random substitutions (which you can reject at pick up & then requires more work for employees to put back üôÑ). I like the option to uncheck substitutions, but why isn‚Äôt it an option to uncheck when you add onto a standing order??

Best App you could ask for Love this app! If you shop at Walmart and have a smartphone you should have this app! It saves you money! But you must submit the receipt within 7 days or right after you use Walmart Pay! Walmart Pay can only be used if you have a credit card or a Walmart card through them! If you charge it and pay it right off there is nothing to worry about it just builds your credit rating up; plus you get the benefits that come with using the app! Trust me this was my first app! It has blown me away! Walmart May have its critics but they sure have it together on their tech end!

Boo to Walmart Pay becoming mandatory So I loved the Walmart app with the savings catcher. I used it all the time, even while in the store to check prices instead of looking for a price checker. Now I‚Äôm getting a message that says in just over a month the only way to take advantage of savings catcher is with Walmart pay. That‚Äôs ridiculous! Once that happens and I spend my collected savings I guess I‚Äôll just delete the app. Most of the time I use cash for my purchases and now with this change, I‚Äôm just out of luck bc I won‚Äôt be able to scan my receipt. First Walmart does away with price matching, but I wasn‚Äôt super upset about that bc I was taking full advantage of savings catcher doing most of the work for me. The whole reason I even downloaded this app was bc of the savings catcher. I guess the upside is I‚Äôll free up some space on my phone.

Walmart Pay / Savings Catcher As of yesterday, the new update to the Walmart app NOW only allows you to scan receipts that were purchased through Walmart Pay. Unbeknownst to me at this point, I made 2 shopping trips which NEITHER could be submitted to savings catcher as they were purchased normally at checkout with my bank card! That is my biggest negative remark. The others are that the app and in store NEVER match on anything, quantity, price, etc!!! Quit shoving Walmart pay down your customer‚Äôs throats!!! The success of something is a direct result of meeting the needs of all clientele not just one group of that clientele!! I will not change my needs to suit your idea of how I should shop. It should be the other way around. Between myself and my husband, we shop 2-4 times weekly at your stores. That ended yesterday with this new update.

Messed up a good thing savings catcher / walmart pay All was well enough until they made using walmart pay a requirement to submit savings catcher receipts. The app logs me out several times while im in line, so im trying to be ready and not hold people up but...the app! No paper receipt is making things more complicated than they should be and if i try to print it from home it wastes ungodly amounts of paper. Worst of all employees don't know how to use it and tell me they ‚Äòhate that thing‚Äô. I was old i could select to not use my card stored in the app, followed the instructions in settings but the setting didn't stay resulting in the app charing almost $200 to a credit card i specifically said no to. The cashier and manager told me the only way to rectify it would be to rescan each item as a return and do the whole thing over. What a mess!!!

Pharmacy is unreliable I ordered refills from the app 2 days ago. Was supposed to be ready the next day at 11. The app said all meds had refills. Called the pharmacy after the time it was supposed to be ready and was on hold for 30 minutes. Couldn‚Äôt wait had to hang up. Called back the next morning to find out they never received my refills order and one of my meds had no refills. They could not answer why this happened and gave me 1-800-Walmart to call. Well I called them and they told me it was because I didn‚Äôt have full access so I couldn‚Äôt order thru the app until the pharmacy gave me full access. But the app told me it was process. So I basically got the run around from the 3 people I talked to because it apparently isn‚Äôt anyone‚Äôs job to make sure anything gets done correctly or that people don‚Äôt die waiting on medication.

Never Filters Correctly Every time I use this app to look for something. I end up get 20,000 some products. For example women‚Äôs clothing, activewear, 22,669 returned results...filter it down more to tops 11,034, clothing size 10,047....I just want to see what‚Äôs available in stores I don‚Äôt want to see every article of clothing from retailers here to China. Yes, we get it you have EVERYTHING but unfortunately for Walmart, everything is overwhelming and a waste of time. Like I‚Äôm really going to search through 11,000 search results not to mention half of them are straight out of China and look sketchy as can be. Sometimes the app lets you filter for in store and sometimes it doesn‚Äôt offer it. Glitches? I never buy anything on here through any seller except for Walmart. Almost 5 stars I would‚Äôve given this app five stars, except for the fact they‚Äôre going to stop allowing you to take pictures of paper receipts and require you to use Walmart pay in order to use the app. I don‚Äôt think that‚Äôs fair, I like having paper receipts for my taxes, and I don‚Äôt like the fact that you are not going to let me have them anymore. Bad Review I used to use this app all the time. The way they have the app set up now to use savings Catcher you have to have all of your card info for each card you use on file. Security issues I recently had my credit card stolen and used at a Walmart in another state than the one I‚Äôm living in. I wasn‚Äôt sure how it happened until I came to the Walmart app to upload a receipt and saw that there were 2 receipts for the stolen purchases and my savings catcher rewards were used with those purchases. The Walmart App is a complete mess! After looking for needful items in the App only to be shown popular items instead!? In this time of need things need to change Look I know you guys deliver in all but in this time of need can you guys deliver a little more than what you do most of the items on your app are either unavailable or you have to pick it up in store it would be nice if you guys would ship out more food so people don‚Äôt have to go out and risk getting Covid-19 please take this into consideration and think about this you could be saving tons of lives by just making more items available to be shipped instead of forcing people to go out to buy what they need again think about this more

author_name: This is a VERY kewl game !!
review_body: Savings catcher not working After several emails and a phone call, I still am out on my (potential) savings catcher rewards. I‚Äôve tried to use the app twice, but it would not scan at checkout. I can go to many different grocery chains stores, but choose Walmart only because of the savings catcher rewards. I was told to reinstall the app (which I‚Äôve done) so we shall see if that helps. And I cannot believe that a company as big as Walmart cannot let you submit a receipt, when it‚Äôs their fault, in order to get your (potential) rewards, as they are so quick to advertise. Another mark against them.

Not fond of current savings catche Please explain why you changed the way savings catcher works- now is very difficult as well as the cashiers do not like it when you ask questions about it, they say ‚Äú you need to check w/ customer service- I‚Äôve asked friends about it also & same answer - too confusing so they don‚Äôt do it anymore either?!
repeat late or incorrect orders and zero support if buying anything from Sellers on their web front you can expect something to go wrong every time. 3 last purchases went like this:

Terrible App Filters The filters on your app are terrible. Look up other clothes sites (TARGET) and see how it‚Äôs done. I love buying your tank tops, but it takes FOREVER to go through them due to the lack of filters. And also, quit displaying stuff that‚Äôs out of stock! Edit: I came back to write a review and discovered I already did. Still same complaint. The app is TERRIBLE. It is literally night and day between your app and targets. I spend so much money with them because I can shop EASILY online with them. I can‚Äôt with Walmart‚Äôs app so I just end up back on target. I‚Äôd rather buy from Walmart since it‚Äôs cheaper but I can‚Äôt. FIX. IT. YOURE LOOSING MONEY!!!!!!

It‚Äôs ok I have used this app for a while now and the savings catcher isn‚Äôt even finding any lower prices. Why?  Oh maybe because Walmart has ran all other competition out of town so you charge What you want!! That‚Äôs your game, drive all the competition out then do what you want!   That‚Äôs sad.  If there was another store I‚Äôd shop there. That‚Äôs terrible!

Red Oak Store BAD SERVICE Service really bad at this store on Ovilla and Ryan!!  Around 645AM stopped in to pick up quick item, only 2 registers open and both had LONG LONG lines!! If you don‚Äôt want to fix that then at least ask us if we want to submit or something. We have enough going on! I think that‚Äôs the whole point...we forget, so you keep the money for a higher price. Walmart makes enough money as it is. Must be nice!!!

Savings catcher Still in disbelief they are canceling the savings catchers feature. First they stopped the scan in the receipt feature, which I understood, but now they‚Äôre taking away the savings catcher altogether which makes no sense because the money is going right back into Walmart. I‚Äôve gone back to my card and relegated the app to store search function. Price function is hit and miss as it seems the database is not always updated.

What can I do to get the update back?! I checked App Store for updates to the main Walmart app and updated tonight but to no avail.

J Dunn I am happy with the app that I have and do not wish to change, now my app is stuck on a update screen, I guess this means you no longer want my business. Needs improvement!!! I‚Äôve always used this app for a number of different things. Awesome App This is the future for retail apps. Whoever designed this one hit a home run. I used the scanner feature to check about a dozen items. I got the price and location of everyone of them. Our local store is famous for not having prices anywhere around an item. Problem solved. I hope it keeps working this good. Walmart has raised the bar for retailers with this app.

Poor customer service If I could give negative stars I would. Placed an order through the app for pickup. Next day played phone tag with the associate at the store and was kept on hold for a total of 37 minutes. Was told that the store made an error and the item was not in stock, so instead of shipping my item to me or fulfilling it when the item was available, they canceled my order. Won‚Äôt be using this service again. Very unreliable, customer service was not helpful and offered no solution, just said oh well and cancelled the order. Poor dependability and poor attitude towards customer.

Disappointed lately Normally I enjoy my WALMART stops. However lately I‚Äôm concerned about how sanitary our store(#1112) is. Full of Discoveries I have discovered the clothing for women and pieces I have purchased, I get compliments, and I am proud to say, ‚Äú

Does not compare apples to apples We have a Winco in our town, which is a major competitor of Walmart, they match or beat Walmarts prices and savings catcher does not compare their prices because they know they would pay out more money to us!  And they took off Walgreens and Riteaid, who also beat their prices. When they removed them from their list, I went from about $150 in redeemable cash the first year, to about $20 the second year. Walmart app This is a terrific app. It locates items in store, you can scan barcodes to find prices. The best feature is Walmart Pay, you can store multiple credit cards and quickly switch from one account to another. Just scan the barcode at register, no need to swipe card. All your shopping trips are stored with purchases and prices.

Dented and crushed I didn‚Äôt have a large order this time just extras about $60 of groceries I got there 5 min before my order time and was told I was way to early so I told them ok I‚Äôll just wait, there was one other car there so I waited ,a nice young man came out and asked my name again and said oh I‚Äôm sorry you are ready when I brought my things in they were crushed severely dented cans I guess with the virus they are very busy so I won‚Äôt be using again I paid for groceries that looked like I bought them from a dent and crush place very unhappy very unorganized

It Used To Be A Good App So far, the only thing this app is good for is finding the location of an item in the store. Just today, I saw that the item was in stock. When I got to the store, it was out of stock. I could‚Äôve gotten the item at another store down the street! Another example, is price checking...looked up the item and it says check your local store for price.  Why even have this app if it‚Äôs useless like that? üëéüèºüëéüèºüëéüèº

Grocery pick up I love the convenience. They are always prompt and courteous. I have always got everything i ordered. If they have to substitute they tell me. Just order on line, pick a time and date, then park in designated area and they load it in your car.

Unreliable results - needs lots of work The savings catcher works great, fortunately, as that‚Äôs what I use most.  The grocery list, however, is almost useless.  I liked that I could enter items and see the aisle number, but you can‚Äôt then sort or group by aisle.  Unbelievable! The other issue is that the app will often tell me an item is out of stock, when I‚Äôm looking at a shelf full of the item.

Love the app This app is wonderful! I can check prices, locate where something is in the store. I also can scan my receipt as soon as I make a purchase either by scanning or selecting the option of add receipt when I pay with Walmart pay.
Services review The site is good but to be honest the savings catcher was hard to find and even harder to use.

Fix what you broke I loved this app in the beginning but now you have to use Walmart pay to get savings catcher benefits, Walmart pay always declines the registered card so you have to go to the car to get it, and last but not least, you limit the receipts that can be submitted to savings catcher even through Walmart pay. Great App Walmart has been making some changes to their stores where I live, but with this app I can find things in under two seconds [kidding]. The Walmart pay feature is very handy and it keeps me from having to get my card out. Right from the app you can find anything in the store and pay for it. Susan Brown You think you can just kick out any negative online review? Walmart online is out of control. This is the fourth time I have had to write this review. So the reason I am writing this review is because I ordered online and Walmart online screwed up my order and overcharged me. Then they came back and charged me for merchandise they sent me in error. When I communicated these two overcharged errors they made nothing was done. Don‚Äôt use them online unless you want to give your money away.

Faulty app! Used to love it, now I HATE it! I used to love the Walmart app but now there are so many problems with it. Savings catcher is gone. Items in stock aren‚Äôt accurate. Does wacky stuff Today I was looking at my Purchase History and saw a picture of ATV tires. It caught my attention since I don‚Äôt own an ATV and certainly didn‚Äôt buy tires for one. I feel I am lost out on getting money back I have deleted and reinstalled this app several times and still get this ongoing issue. UGH!

I have no orders placed for pickup so go figure.  Following that notification leads to an eventual albeit slow to appear dialog asking if I want to view the instructions.
