It works now! I had issues before with the Walmart pay but it has been resolved and I am able to use it! I really like the app! The easy reorder is great and I like scanning the Barcode at checkout to apply my savings and automatically bill my Walmart credit card! So quick and convenient!

EASY TO LOVE I absolutely love this app. I‚Äôve already made about $110 over the year JUST by scanning my receipts!!! It‚Äôs seriously that easy. If there was money on the ground you would surly pick it up so it‚Äôs basically that simple. Thank you Walmart for having cheap prices and then giving ya money back when there is a better price out there.

Great place to shop if you like saving money. They are ALWAYS out of something I want. I don‚Äôt like that it keeps track of what I buy and constantly nags and hassles me to reorder especially items I rarely purchase. I bought a fabric softener ball a few weeks ago. I‚Äôll probably never buy another as long as I live but the app constantly nags me to buy another. The store I shop in Greenfield, IN. Is ALWAYS out of something I need and want to buy. It is very frustrating that I can‚Äôt give away my money for something I want because they are ALWAYS out of SOMETHING.

No need to shop around! I used to chase the current sales and have to shop at multiple stores. Now that I‚Äôve discovered the savings catcher app there‚Äôs no need to shop around. With the scan of my receipt I will get the best deal on my purchases! I like to save money, and with this app I also save a lot of time.
Where‚Äôs Mr. Sam? Walmart‚Äôs is a low price leader as advertised.

Walmart savings catcher Initially it worked well but now I have receipts pending for over 4 weeks.  When I tried to find a way to contact them, the help has questions that others have asked, a comments section and a ‚Äúchat‚Äù feature that you have a wait of over 3 min. It is difficult to express all I needed to about the pending receipts while texting and I gave up.  So basically the savings catcher is hit or miss

Save money! Great deal! For us poor, living pay check to pay check, one less things for us to do finding the good deal around town, saves us so much for gas and stress to find a cheaper groceries! Thank you again for making it easy for my family! God bless and good luck everyone! Loyal Walmart customer!

Love the App, but... For some reason the app keeps switching my Walmart Pay card. I just started having this issue about 2 months ago. I hope that bug is fixed because it‚Äôs a real hassle paying with the app, only to find out that it‚Äôs not the card that you have selected to pay with. Otherwise, VERY convenient and time saving üôÇ

Selection of products Very rarely is a product not available. I always seem to find what I am looking for.  The quality of their clothing has improved over the years. If you haven‚Äôt been to Walmart, I highly recommend you give them another chance.

Suggestion The only thing I don‚Äôt like about this app is I can‚Äôt redeem my rewards dollars without setting up Walmart pay... I already have Apple Pay on my personal devise. I wish they were more diverse with device payment. I also wish reward dollars could be automatically redeemable via an e gift card in the app so you can use them with out Walmart Pay.

Great idea but doesn‚Äôt always work I LOVE this option. It keeps me from the old way of price matching at the register, holding everyone else up. However, they do not always catch things and I have had receipts marked no items found when half the receipt had sale items from other stores. When you contact them they will not answer and it can‚Äôt be changed online like it shows.  I have lost quite a bit of money because of it.

Savings catcher I don‚Äôt get paid enough when I check myself out which is only option for the most part. Less workers is less overhead and that should create savings for the company and consumers but the prices are the same if not more. Maybe y savings catcher will fine me some $$

Love the app I love all the extra bells and whistles that this app has ! For some reason today , I can not load the weekly add due to it saying oops something went wrong try again later. It has all my other info but not the store I chose. Tried choosing another store and I can‚Äôt even do that , it keeps saying oops something went wrong try again later. PLEASE FIX!!

Savings Catcher Inconvenient I have been using savings catcher for years. This new update that now requires me to use my Walmart pay in order to submit a receipt is TERRIBLE. I will be deleting this app and no longer using it once my last receipts have been finalized. It‚Äôs no longer convenient for me. I do not wish to have my debit card attached and it‚Äôs too much of a hassle to add a gift card EVERY time I‚Äôm in Walmart (which is pretty much daily). What purpose does this serve for customers? Even the cashiers are confused and not sure how it works now.

author_name: Great game for a pet lover!!
review_body: No Scan, No Fan I fell in love with the Walmart app when I first discovered that I could scan my receipts and save money. Now I am unable to scan receipts unless I use Walmart pay. I like Walmart pay but I don‚Äôt always use my card to buy groceries. Sometimes I use cash so this is very inconvenient. It would be nice to have a manual option for these cases. However, I like all other uses for the app except the savings catcher switch over.

Love ordering and picking up!! I just love this app!  I have multiple sclerosis and am unable to drive anymore so my daughter used to have to go to the store and walk through the store to get my groceries but now I order online and she just drives to store and my groceries are loaded in her car for her!!  That is so so great!!  Thank you so much!!

Good if Walmart receipt printers ever start working Love the idea,  but waaaaaaay too often the receipt printer at the store is half broken and the QR and barcode aren‚Äôt printed properly making the savings catcher a serious pain. Walmart should start holing these stores accountable and ensure ALL their printers are properly working.
Well made app Unlike some other reviews, this review is for the app, not Walmart‚Äôs stance on gun safety. Although I‚Äôm glad they‚Äôre taking a leadership role with that.

Online shopping Like how I can type in receipt # for price catcher.  Only thing I would add to online grocery shopping, would be comment area for produce.  Example would be partly green bananas, and large red gala apples.....
Too many ad notifications, but you can turn them off. Updated:  Thanks for the response from Walmart.

Need Store Maps Walmart is a great store for dozens of reasons. My shopping experiences have generally been very positive for frequently purchased items. For first time purchases, it‚Äôs like being on safari.  Yes, having item aisle numbers is absolutely helpful. What‚Äôs even better?  A store map! If the app has one, I‚Äôve not discovered it. The Target app has a great store map. It shows store layout, item aisle number and item position on the aisle.

Get rid of the assistant pop up This app was great and helpful before the assistant pop-up became a thing. I work at walmart and regularly use the app when looking for items for customers. Typing in the item I‚Äôm looking for only for it to disappear because of that pop-up is extremely frustrating for me and the customer because then I have to wait for it to go away and type the item back in. It does not need to pop up every time I open the app.

Savings Catcher For AT LEAST the last week I haven‚Äôt been able to ‚Äúpaste‚Äù my Grocery pickup order receipts into the Savings Catcher. Pretty aggravated that in order for me to potentially be making some $$, I would have to write down the entire thing then type it in. It shouldn‚Äôt be that hard! I see no reason why it doesn‚Äôt link the receipt into the Walmart app considering it knows what I buy in the Grocery app under ‚Äúreorder now‚Äù.

Love the new app but... Hi, I absolutely love the new app and would really like to give it 5 stars but there‚Äôs a few things wrong. It won‚Äôt allow me to see my purchase history. It keeps telling me that my internet connection isn‚Äôt working when I know for sure it is. It also constantly empties my cart while I‚Äôm still browsing for more items. I like the fresh look but it has a few bugs that need to be fixed.

Savings catcher I too used savings catcher religiously. My husband doesn‚Äôt like using phone apps. You only get the savings if you do that. So we miss out on the savings we could be getting by not being allowed to manually enter his receipts. I don‚Äôt like feeling being ‚Äúforced‚Äù into using something in order to benefit from it. Not taking into account older customers who don‚Äôt know how to use all of this electronic stuff.

App - Change for the better? I‚Äôm not fond of the changes that have occurred on the app. I couldn‚Äôt scan my receipt as I used to. My savings catcher balance has been $0.00 for the longest which I find it hard to believe that lower prices haven‚Äôt been found over the last 6 months. I really enjoyed how the app was set up BEFORE all the changes. Also, TEACH YOUR EMPLOYEES HOW TO USE THE APP. If I ever have a question, they seem clueless. Not a good look.

Can‚Äôt find my account now Well apparently with last update it logged me out of the app on my phone. Thought ok will just log back in! Well no such luck it tells me incorrect password or email then if I try to reset my password it gives me an error and to top it off if I try to create new account it says it already exists but won‚Äôt let me on. This is ridiculous as all my receipts are on there and I have money on my savings catcher but now I can‚Äôt get to any of it.

Order Pickup Ordered a Visio TV, and a TV Stand through the WalmartPickup said it was available at the Jungerman store got a text 4 hours later telling me only one of the items is available. After already paying for both of the items. Needless to say I am very upset. Giving a rating of 1/2 star.

Retired Love Walmart the canyon country store is clean and ver organized. I can take care of all my shopping needs all at the same time. Home products, out door products and all are grocery needs. Plus the savings catcher program actually saves you money. No other store can give you you all that. Thanks Walmart  Robert Bow

Walmart App I personally love this app, especially for the savings catcher. I have used my savings 2x already on groceries. The only down fall sometimes is that if the barcode isn‚Äôt read correctly you have to manually input their 16 digit ticket number other than that it saves your previous purchases.

Great App! This is a great app and I love the new look. The one thing it‚Äôs missing is, if you load your total cash amount earned to your email it should automatically total up what‚Äôs not used in your email onto the next time you load your total cash to your email so you don‚Äôt lose money earned.

Very useful!! I love that, I can scan the barcode on any item in the store and get the price. I save time cause the app tells you the isle that the item is on. Helps you from running around the store looking, when you are press for time. It is a very useful app, everything on it comes in handy.

Blessing I love how Wal-Mart price compares with other stores so I can get the best savings out there. I would love if they could get a better meat quality though. Seems that meat these days just aren‚Äôt the quality that it use to me. The inject things in the chicken to make it seem fresher. I must say, I buy my meat for the most part @ Kroger‚Äôs.

Fast friendly service! Walmart pick-up is the Best! The delivery crew is so fast & friendly. It is nice to have a friendly smile at the end of the day, as they pack my trunk with groceries. A shout out to Michael & Kyle in Centerville- they have actually memorized all of the regulars names... I just think that is so cool! Thank you for making my life easier Walmart pick-up!!

No more savings catcher I definitely do not like the new savings catcher. Now you can only submit receipts, using Walmart pay. Your savings automatically go, to your next purchase. You can no longer pay with cash, and get the savings. You can no longer save up, to buy yourself, or others, something special. You have to put your card info, into the app, for any card you may use. If you lose your phone, the next person will have access, to spending on your cards. The risk is not worth the rewards.

Reimburse Not really true that Wal mart store gives you the difference in price from competitors. I did purchase a 65‚Äù TV and found it cheaper in another place. Compare it to my Wal Mart receipt and tried to collect my difference and the Manager Mario and Liz from The Del R√≠o, Texas location Store did not respect my receipt and told me that it has to be before the purchase. This is completely wrong but when these two get together nothing that you can do.

Saving catcher Okay first I got to say as a busy mother of four whose always on the go; I loved that BEFORE this update I could go and buy what I needed then submit my receipt. Now I have to use my phone to open the app on my phone to pay and wrestle four kids at the same time. Have you ever tried to do this? I hate this update. So uncool! Majority of the time I don‚Äôt even have service in your store. So tell me (whose been using this service for as long as it been around) how that helps my family. Who thought of this? Are they parents? FIX IT BACK! Please!

Savings Catcher It‚Äôs clear now what your goal was- to STOP saving people money. Not everyone can pay with savings catcher , so when you took the option away that receipts can‚Äôt be scanned, you hurt the people who need it most - the poor. I‚Äôm glad we have 1 more grocery in our small town because they get my business from now on, hands down. ( you might want to re-think this do you know how much food is bought at your stores from SNAP benefits? That‚Äôs who you hurt , the poor people. Just another way Wal-Mart shows they don‚Äôt care.

VERY SLOW This app is very slow and now when I click something I am browsing on the app it directs me to the app store to download a random app. The new update doesn‚Äôt even let me open the app it automatically closes once i open it. Very disappointed in walmart being that I use this app frequently and I have to go on the website to find what im looking for. Definitely needs to fix all the bugs that‚Äôs causing it to automatically crash when I am opening it.

All Walmart stores I should be able to submit all receipts that I accrue from any Walmart store that I shop. When I leave work I shop at the closest Walmart to me at that time. When I‚Äôm home I go to a different Walmart because it‚Äôs closer to my home. Not being able to submit my receipts from both stores is not what I want.

Checkout Cart In Need of More Advanced Software In my opinion, Check out cart could use some work and updates to software to make editing & maneuvering through cart, particularly ‚ÄúSaved For Later‚Äù list. If you tap on any item or remove any items it updates and bumps you back to the beginning of your checkout cart. Frustrating if you have a lot of items in your saved list

Used to work... Using WalMart Pay was formerly easy. Now, none of my cards work through the app. Uninstalling and reinstalling hasn‚Äôt helped. A typical transaction works like this: I connect with the terminal with WalMart Pay, scan my items, attempt to pay, and am informed that someone has gone wrong, and an alternate form of payment is required. So, I fish out the card that doesn‚Äôt work through WalMart Pay, insert it into the card reader and pay. WalMart Pay adds complication and hassle, but it is the only way to utilize Savings Catcher.

Disappointed in the updates I love the Walmart app and would always scan all of receipts for the savings catcher. Now you can‚Äôt do that and the only receipts that qualify are the ones you use through WalMart pay. Unfortunately for me my primary bank (which is a credit union) does not support Walmart pay. So now I can‚Äôt scan anymore receipts. Very frustrated and unhappy. Give us the option of scanning our receipt regardless of if we use Walmart pay regularly or not :(

Returns on this app isn‚Äôt working I was hoping to skip the line at customer service by starting a return on the app & it gives me a message saying, ‚Äúwe‚Äôre sorry, to complete this return, please take items to customer service‚Äù and now I‚Äôm forced to wait in line. Could you please fix this so I can get thru with this for in the future if I ever decide to return once again and NOT wait in line? Thank you!

Lost prescription I used the app to transfer and refill a prescription and somehow it got lost in the system. It‚Äôs still lost. I called the original pharmacy and they confirmed that it was transfers and the place but that pharmacy doesn‚Äôt have it and can not tell me where it went. I even got an email saying the prescription was being filled. No location but there was a phone number to the pharmacy I chose to transfer to. In the end I am having to call my doctor and hope they will send a new prescription order in time.
Ok... ...I have not had problems with Walmart app. I do however am upset that they got rid of the savings catcher. Every receipt I submit, I get a minimum of $1.00 back. Every. Single. Time....

Garbage Other (original) app was pretty good. This one crashes a lot. Other irritating features include adding items to your cart, only to have them disappear. Seriously, I added several items, double checked the quantity, then clicked on cart, saw the items at the top of the list. Then saw them disappear. Out of stock perhaps? I was able reproduce this bug with a number of different items. This version needs a lot more testing/quality control. I‚Äôve deleted it and reinstalled the original.

MaryPat Keller Great review for our delivery guy Juan at the local Carson /Paramount Walmart store. We have been using the grocery app. to buy food and have really enjoyed Picking up our orders. Juan was Great-  Very professional and polite. The energy and effort he brought out to the parking lot was refreshing. Thanks!  And actually all the delivery persons have been very helpful and accommodating!

Do not trust Savings catcher! I spend $200+ each trip on groceries and buy only name brand, normal size items but there are no competitors? You have packaging company change the barcode so you don‚Äôt have compare prices. I used to get several dollars back each trip now I‚Äôm lucky to see a buck. There are a dozen other local grocery stores with these same items and you compare with these stores! We aren‚Äôt stupid, I guess we can‚Äôt trust you so I‚Äôll be doing my own comparing, especially when they have sales and you never do.
Great application! The application itself is inspired. You have some great minds at work there, and I look forward to seeing what else you can come up with!
Thank you Love Walmart 100%üíúüíúüíúüíú

Savings catcher I love this. We have a large family, and Walmart is our friend. I use the savings catcher almost as easily as my right hand! The change just adds up and up and while it‚Äôs not that much, after a few visits I usually have accumulated around $7-10!!

Failing our country After watching a video of how you support Obama and then vilify our president 45 Trump. I have decided I will no longer be using this app. I will not be purchasing any items from Walmart from here on out. I have previous purchases with warranty‚Äôs. If I was able to return the items and get the money I spent there back. I would happily do so. How you choose to sell these items is your choice as a corporation. However my choice as a customer is to take my 1200$ shopping trips every 2 weeks to another store.

No more Savings Catcher So now after October 29 you can no longer submit receipts to Savings Catcher. You MUST pay using Walmart Pay and have your receipt automatically checked for savings. If you do not give Walmart your credit card or debit card information to pay using the app your receipt isn‚Äôt checked for savings. You cannot pay by cash and get a receipt that is eligible for Savings Catcher.

Disappointed in new savings catcher I have had this app for a long time and always loved using it until they changed the savings catcher and I went from 5 star to 1 star and honestly I would have ranked it no stars if possible. It‚Äôs sad that Walmart does not take on consideration the fact that a lot of people still use cash to pay and not cards and the savings catcher is only allowed to be used with Walmart pay. Very disappointed in Walmart and like I said before I‚Äôve always used this app and that‚Äôs going to change.

Bring back savings catcher without Walmart pay. This app is absolutely worthless without savings catcher being useable on purchases made through any method other than Walmart pay. Until that functionality is restored, I will never use this app again, nor will I encourage anyone to use it, nor will I continue to buy the majority of my purchases at Walmart stores knowing that the convenience of savings catcher makes my driving all over town to shop unnecessary. Your products are inferior and your app worthless.

Helpful in store Because of the lack of functioning in-store price scanners (hanging signage showing scanner, no functioning scanner underneath) this app is helpful. One frustration in store is when item scans but no price for item. Also, if store database shows no inventory (though I have the item in my hand), no price pulls up. Requires me to find a functioning scanner- a rarity. Fix these issues and the app is an essential shopping tool.

Update no good I originally gave this app 5 stars. It‚Äôs down to 2 since the latest changes. We can no longer scan paper receipts. If you‚Äôre going to submit a receipt to savings catcher you have to use Walmart pay at the register. I do not link my debit card to any app, so if I have a zero balance on Walmart pay, it‚Äôs a waste of time to open it just to scan. I will no longer encourage others to use this app and may delete it unless this changes.

Where's the shopping list? Before as I'm shopping for my groceries, I was able to scan each item and know the total of what's in my basket before I go to the register. It was very convenient when you don't have enough at least you would know your total so you don't get embarrassed of finding out at the register you went over your budget! Who would want to go through that?

Savings Catcher I am extremely upset with Walmart over the fact that I had an accumulated amount over $43+ in my savings catcher and suddenly I receive an email in Tues 10-10 indicating they have automatically cleared out my account with an emailed EGift Card.  I did not ask to redeem my balance and was given no choice as to how I wanted it redeemed to me.  As of today there has been no email received as per stated. I do not even own a printer nor access to one therefore Walmart, how do you propose those of us ‚Äúprint‚Äù these EGift cards?!? This is complete crap.

‚ÄúLists‚Äù don‚Äôt work I was eager to try the new list feature that groups items by aisle (based on my selected store) and gives me an estimated total price, but the feature doesn‚Äôt work. I type in something like ‚Äúmilk‚Äù, but it‚Äôs just listed as ‚Äúmilk‚Äù and doesn‚Äôt suggest brands of milk or size of the container to add to the list. That means it‚Äôs not going to give a price for the item.

Needs better sorting criteria I‚Äôve used the app about a dozen times over two years. A better sorting feature would help. For example, I looked for sweaters and over 8,000 come up.  I looked for clock radios. Over 5,000 show up and I can sort alphabetically or by price. Sorting by brand would help. Or by extra features such as presence of CD player or battery options. I appreciate being able to order online and then pick up in a store, but better sorting would help.

FRAUDULENT CHARGES ABOUND!!!! I used this app for home delivery during the lockdown. It seemed convenient. I then found 9, (count them) unauthorized charges from Walmart!! Even after I cancelled my card, the fraud continues...charges that were made just
The app WAS fine, now it‚Äôs not The Walmart app was fine the way it was. I was able to check info regarding my chosen local store, keep track of purchase history, look up pharmacy info.
Old system to solve new system problems This app appears to compete withAmazon app and service. Doesn‚Äôt come close.

Don‚Äôt like merged app It appears a recent update has merged the Grocery App and original Walmart app. We live so close to a Walmart Market I can go in often so I don‚Äôt use the order and pickup option but now that‚Äôs an extra step I have to get past just  to get to the main menu. It would help some if it just went to the main menu when it detects you are in store so I can quickly get to Walmart Pay

App arbitrarily returned / canceled my 1st order I placed my first order on Thursday to pick up all four items on Saturday. When I checked my email Saturday morning, I had emails confirming my return. I don‚Äôt need an app to make decisions for me.  So far it has taken two additional orders to get the four items I wanted. Plus there will be unnecessary charges & refunds on my checking account. I hate going into Walmart which is why I tried the app & pick up. I will go back to paying more just to avoid Walmart if you can‚Äôt do better than this.

Hate app changes! I use to love this app. Up until they forced you to add your credit card info into app  and use at store. That‚Äôs the only way to get savings now! I don‚Äôt always use the same credit card. I like to build point into different cards. I loved scanning receipt into app, and watching my saving grow! Not anymore, so I guess I‚Äôll not using this app much anymore. It‚Äôs even hard to find online orders.

Savings catcher Like every single other person who downloaded the Walmart app for savings catcher, I feel scammed, not only do I "feel" scammed, I know it... straight up, literally conned. I could go on and explain how they do it and why they invented the savings catcher feature in the first place, but read literally any other review regarding Savings Catcher and you'll understand. Lastly, Walmart doesn't care about their customers, not even a little bit, while we're on the topic, they are even less about their employees. Facts on top of facts. Have a great day.

Update broke your wishlist! In one of your updates it broke how the wishlist feature worked. And here is why it‚Äôs broke. The customer searches for an item in the app then adds it to the wishlist for purchase later. When later comes around you can‚Äôt just go to the wishlist and click on the item to order it you have to go back and search for the item again just to order it. This is why the wishlist feature is broken.

Kathy I really like the North Olmsted Wal-Mart the employee‚Äôs are very nice they almost always say hi if you ask for help you get help.   The biggest problem I have is finding things I wish you had away of checking for items myself that would tell me what department and row it‚Äôs in. Thanks again to the hard working employees.
Savings catcher The Walmart app and savings catcher have been awesome.  So easy to use and if you have a problem somebody gets back to you quickly.

Better than expected So the first thing displayed looks like the advertising department took over from customer service. But the items in the ‚ÄúServices‚Äù tab allow quick access to the part I actually downloaded added the app for.

Stupid changes Savings catcher worked beautifully, but now it feels like your customers are getting screwed. Will we no longer be able save up our funds and use them when we CHOOSE, since scanning with Walmart pay automatically deducts what‚Äôs in there?? What if our phones don‚Äôt work at the time of checking out?? Savings catcher is literally the only reason I still shop at Walmart! HEB is closer to where I live, so maybe it‚Äôs time to switch stores.

Savings Catcher Ruined to save Walmart Pay Walmart, in a blatant attempt to prop up Walmart Pay, now requires it to use Savings Catcher.  No more scanning. It‚Äôs just stupid.  But, I‚Äôve seen it before.  Take a crappy unpopular feature and tie it to something people like.  I‚Äôm done with Savings Catcher, Walmart Pay, and Walmart for a while.  It‚Äôs not worth the ADDITIONAL hassle over saving 50¬¢.

Miss savings catcher This app used to be great but now that savings catcher has to be linked to your card thru the app it‚Äôs become a pain. Not to mention my Walmart account was hacked over the weekend putting a hold on all my money since I had to have a card linked for the savings catcher to work. On another note, the pharmacy part tells me my rxs are ready for pickup when they really aren‚Äôt. Pretty worthless app now to me after being hacked. Bring back the receipt uploaded! I can‚Äôt trust to keep a card on file after what happened!

Debit Card information comprised I uploaded app and photo of my debit card as instructed for payment on this app and coincidentally was contacted by my bank related to fraudulent activity for the same card information at a Walmart. I had not pursued any other ‚Äúonline‚Äù activity or transactions using that debit card in while so my gut told me not to upload this information and yet I did. Thank goodness for my bank contacting me or who knows how much more I would have lost. I can‚Äôt prove it but I‚Äôve lost trust in their security controls. Lesson learn/Never again~

Review for grocery delivering Delivery of my groceries is so convenient. Especially during this trying time. The drivers are delightful and for the most part I usually get everything on my list. Keep up the good work.
Needs improvement Needs a lot of improvement,

Awesome App I have used this App for 4 years. My daughter told me about it for the Savings Catcher, which is a great program! But there‚Äôs so much more to it. I love being able to use the pharmacy and place orders that will ship to my home or I can pickup in store. This is seriously in my top 5 favorite Apps and I highly recommend it!

Developer: please read The only reason I was able to shop through this app was because I had previously scanned my receipts and the app had a history of the products i commonly use. However, searching through the app and trying to filter does NOT work. Horrible! It‚Äôs frustrating. Simple thing as filter handbags to Totes and it showed the SAME listed products. Which was incorrect - the bag didn‚Äôt look like a tote bag OR had the word in the name. Fix ASAP please.

Update auto service barcode to view at home How bout doing something so the barcode tag the auto service dept. gives you can be scanned at home to see when work is completed? Would be a real time saver, plus when staying at store, i wouldn't have to walk all over looking for 1 of the 3 in the store that works, thanks..

Disappointed I‚Äôm kind of disappointed Walmart has decided to take scanning receipts away from savings catcher. Not everyone has a debit card or gift card etc. to pay with. I‚Äôm going to do my best to continue using the app but from now on I‚Äôd actually have to go into the store and buy what I‚Äôd like which causes me time I could be doing something else. Anyway having that ability was fun while it lasted...

Savings going down the drain Once a happy saver with the savings catcher. The recent switch to Walmart Pay requires a hold up in the line or you have to remind yourself to have your app ready to scan before starting your transaction. This has been an issue the last 3 out of 4 visits to the store. Not being able to scan your receipt after the transaction will continue to cause a loss of savings and that will drive me to other means of saving. Savings Catcher was a hit but why take a working system away?
Overall OK app but... So funny, the app cannot scan the Walmart MasterCard...you have to manually put in the credit card number.

DON‚ÄôT TRUST WALMART I had surgery on Friday before Christmas and trusted Walmart to deliver my items for my grand babies. The items showed in stock. Then realizing today, Christmas Eve, the items were still not here, I opened my emails to see Walmart cancelled the orders because they were not in stock. Thanks for ruining Christmas for me Walmart. Your app is horrible because your app said the items were in stock. Boo, big thumbs down.

Needs work I like the app but I don‚Äôt love it.  I was happy about knowing which aisle to find an item in but it was wrong ALL of the time. (Yes, the location was correct). It also said items were ‚Äúout of stock‚Äù, when I added them to my list, but at the store they were not.  Could be a great app but it‚Äôs not yet.

Great experience The pickup at the Walmart in Country Club Hills was a pleasure. The customer service representative who assisted me did an excellent job in processing my order.  She had a wonderful personality was was very expedient in her service.
Terrible They are getting rid of savings catcher soon. Terrible decision. The only reason that most people use Walmart pay is to use savings catcher.

author_name: Bri Bris reviews on this app
review_body: Walmart pharmacy mobile app The pharmacy section has never worked on here. Would be nice to keep track online but every time I try to pull up records there isn‚Äôt any history of me getting my prescriptions. I get several refilled monthly, how can it say there‚Äôs no record? Might just look into transferring my scripts.

Walmart Pay/Scanning exempts I began using Walmart Pay thinking all of my receipts would be automatically scanned.  But they haven‚Äôt been.  I don‚Äôt know if there is a way for me to do it manually.  When I ask my cashiers at checkout, no one seems to much about the app at all.

Good app but I'm having an issue Great app I love it I'm just having an issue because it no longer lets me create new lists. Maybe I'm the only one having this issue or it's a bug with the update? If it is a bug please fix it, it's the only bad thing about the app.
Money back Savings catcher is easy to use and adds up fast. If you are shopping at Walmart and not using the app- you are throwing away money üëç

Saving I have a hard time scanning and it would be nice if the savings were easier to receive. I had one gift card everything was put on and now I have some money but can‚Äôt put it on that same gift card.
Food availability. The only aggravating thing is the Walmart in commerce stops carrying food items that are apparently very popular but they discontinue them anyways. Even when asked to keep them.

Smart Technology This is really the best way to save your receipts and transactions. No more fumbling with unreadable receipts, no guessing when you made the purchase, this is a technology all retailers should employ. Thanks Walmart.
Love shopping at Walmart I find everything I need plus a lot of great things I don‚Äôt need but ‚Äòhave to have‚Äô.
Savings WalMart is the place to shop good quality best prices in town also I am a share holder of WalMart stock why would I shop anywhere else

Don't change Savings Catcher! I only pay in cash and with the new way I won't be able to use savings catcher. Another problem I have is when I've tried to use my balance using Walmart Pay I can't since the app always logs me out when I'm at a Walmart and also there's never any service or wifi for me to be able to use the app within the store.

Cannot share list between family members There are a lot of nice features the Walmart app offers but the most important one is missing - to be able to share the same grocery list between family members so we can all add our needed items to the same list!
Love it! Love the app! Especially for my prescriptions and love that I can scan to get the price of items without having to look for one of the store scanners.
Great checkout service Yolanda did a great job packing my purchases and being careful not to let anything get broken or be too heavy.  She was very friendly too!
Great app Just wish we had the ability to nick name certain credit cards under payment methods

New scanner The latest app update seems easier to navigate, but the barcode scanner doesn‚Äôt work very well. I always end up typing in the info, which isn‚Äôt convenient at all. The older version scanner was fantastic!
More Businesses need to get on board! Wish so many other stores/businesses would do the same! Start a Savings Catcher program!
In store pick up Took less than 5 minutes since I did check in and let them know I was entourage to pickup! Easy as 123!

Savings Catcher I find that the process of entering a receipt into ‚ÄúSavings Catcher‚Äù a problem. More often than not, I get spinning wheel on my iPhone indicating a problem connecting. There have been times when this issue has caused enough delay to outdated my entry. Also not happy that many grocery items, especially produce, were excluded from SC that were originally included.

No ‚Äúsecurity‚Äù tab I recently received a purchase email from my account.  I didn‚Äôt make the purchase so I immediately went to my account to flag the order but there isn‚Äôt anyway to flag a purchase as fraudulent.  I changed my password and deleted all of my payment methods but it sure would be nice to be able to notify you guys so that my account can be monitored.

Fix Bugs I‚Äôm upset with the update on the Walmart app. Ever since then I have been having lots of problems. I hate the store assistant it takes up my time of looking for things I‚Äôm looking for and second you guys need to update the app with pickup. I ordered to do a pick from a store and they didn‚Äôt have my items. Fix this app ASAP or I‚Äôm deleting this app and moving to Target.

All in one app I‚Äôd like to merge my Walmart app with my grocery pick up app to avoid having two separate apps for one store. Hoping saving catchers can be made easier as well . Instead of me copy and pasting from my emailed receipt .

Too slow I like the features of the app but with the savings catcher it is way too slow. Takes for ever to load.  Likely due to loading months or years of receipts.  This could easily be resolved by having an option to purge old data.  Or better memory management.  When that happens i will change to a 5 star.

Fine in the beginning I had this app for a while now, it was fine then, but problems began when I got a new phone and all the money I had accumulated just disappeared. I had built up more reward dollars again, and once again it all disappeared, I don‚Äôt recommend this app because you will be disappointed once your reward dollars disappear

Walmart the best When you buy something at Walmart, use Walmart savings section to scan your receipt. About 3 to 5 days, you can earn money. Got to love it.

Good job I enjoy the Walmart app tremendously. To reorder prescriptions and pay by app, check for savings in savings catcher, scan items in the store. I for one love Walmart and the benefits of the app.
Great App Walmart app is super convenient when you are on the go. I love how I can scan and save my receipts, order pictures and prescriptions all in one place. Keep it up Walmart!!

You need to fix this Previously had a higher rating but I am changing to ONE star. And telling the makers of this all you need to fix it.  It will never scan the receipts. When I click to even go to that screen nothing happens. The app is slow and non functional.  It is good when things actually work. But lately that is close to the 12th of never.
Must have app for WalMart shoppers This little app does everything for me! When I can do scan and go with this app like Sam‚Äôs club it will be even better!
Love the search function. Love the search function.  I can find what I need and what isle it is on. I also love the scan function and Walmart pay
I like Walmart! I appreciate Walmart trying to keep the prices down. I really like doing the Grocery pick up service! What a blessing to busy moms! I also like my Savings Catcher rewards!! Thanks!!

I love Walmart ‚ù§Ô∏è. This is my favorite store. I gave Walmart 5 Stars, because every time I go to Walmart I always find what I am seeking to purchase. The Walmart stores are pretty clean and their restrooms are well taken care of and fully well stocked!
Pleasantly surprised! I downloaded this app on a whim- and was surprised to find out it works as described! Already saved with Savings Catcher- I plan on using this "found money" during the holidays.

Always Horrible If it‚Äôs not one thing, it‚Äôs another with this app, just like their stores! I have an iPhone 7+ and find myself at the store and Walmart Pay will not work. Wal-Mart Pay didn't work, had to ask for a manager to get my receipt. Meh. I like the reorder history but the search is pretty much useless and shopping by category is no better. At least half the time when I click on a filter it doesn't actually narrow it down at all, and when it does it appears that about 75% of the merchandise is miscategorized.

Was great with savings catcher BUT! Savings Catcher & Walmart Pay Before Walmart created the Savings Catcher feature on their website, I would shop at numerous stores just to save a buck or two. Now I‚Äôm able to do all my shopping at one place - Walmart & only Walmart. I‚Äôm able to do so because if the item I purchased happens to be on sale elsewhere, Walmart will reimburse me the difference on an e-gift card. It allows you to pay with your cellphone, at checkout, via Walmart Pay. Even though it‚Äôs not given back to me in actual cash, I have no problems spending money on a gift card. I‚Äôm now able to utilize all the local sales ads at one location, cut my shopping day in half, as well as pocket my gas money I would‚Äôve used traveling from store to store. Even though so far I‚Äôve been mostly pleased with the Savings Catcher feature, there are a few negative points I‚Äôd like to mention. One major problem is the majority of the Walmart employees have no idea how it works. I find myself educating most of the cashiers at the checkout counter. I‚Äôm not sure if this has been fixed or not but the last time I tried getting gas and attempted to pay via my e-gift card (Walmart Pay), it would not allow me to do so. The only way I could use my funds for gas was to transfer funds from my Walmart Pay Account to a handheld gift card then pay for the gas that way. I sure hope Walmart does something about this because I personally wouldn‚Äôt use Savings Catcher and Walmart Pay if I‚Äôm not able to use my reimbursement money on anything I wanted.
